org.vanted.addons.stressminimization

Class StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.vanted.addons.stressminimization.StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator

  • class StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides stress calculation and stress optimization functionality on basis of a stored layout. Based on the paper "Graph Drawing by Stress Majorization" Emden R. Gansner, Yehuda Koren and Stephen North at AT&T Labs â€” Research, Florham Park, NJ 07932, 2005

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix layout, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix distances, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix weights)
      Creates a new StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator instance, with the given weights, distances and the current layout.

      org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix calcOptimizedLayout()
      Optimizes the stored layout and updates it to the optimized version.

    • Constructor Detail

      • StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator

        public StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix layout,
                                          org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix distances,
                                          org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix weights)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new StressMajorizationLayoutCalculator instance, with the given weights, distances and the current layout.
        Parameters:
        layout - The current or initial layout: A two dimensional n*d matrix where n is the number of nodes and d is the dimension (typically two).
        distances - The distance matrix (n*n matrix) with distance of the nodes i and j at position i,j
        weights - The weight matrix (n*n matrix) with the weight for the nodes i and j and position i,j
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

        public double calcStress()
        Calculates the stress for the stored layout using the formula $$ stress(X) = \sum_{i
        Returns:

      • calcOptimizedLayout

        public org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealMatrix calcOptimizedLayout()
